Spyware Doctor is a multi-award winning utility spyware removal software that detects, removes and protects your PC from thousands of potential spyware, adware, trojans, keyloggers, spybots and tracking threats. Protect your privacy and computing habits from prying eyes and virtual trespassers with the help of Spyware Doctor. 

Spyware Doctor - a program to protect your PC from the infiltration of spyware and adware, trojans, keyloggers, unwanted software, phishing, pop-up advertising, malicious sites, rootkits, etc. Spyware Doctor monitors activity on the browser, ICQ work and other programs that you use the Internet. Easy to use. 
Mayor Spyware Doctor specially designed for normal users, instead of professional experts. This is one reason why it was awarded the Public "'s Choice in 2005, 2006 and 2007. Automatically configured with a minimum number of applications to ensure optimum protection. Ie immediately after installation and ongoing protection. 

Enhanced Alert Spyware Doctor only alerts the user about the fact spyware detection. And this is important because you should not be interrupted by cryptic questions every time you install software, add the site to your favorites or change your PC settings. These messages can be confusing and lead to undesirable consequences, such as programs not working, lost favorites or the execution of spyware. We've done the research, and this is no longer necessary.

New features and enhancements: 
"Better protection, better scanner, a lower consumption of system resources 
"Password protection to prevent unauthorized access

"Increased usability
